initial_story:
The Eurovision Song Contest is just around the corner and this year, it's taking place in Malmo, Sweden.

You can find out all about the event right here.

The UK's entry for 2024 is Olly Alexander who'll be performing his song, Dizzy.

But how's he feeling ahead of the big night, where he'll perform in front of 200 million people!

De-Graft sat down with him to find out all about his preparation for the competition.

The Eurovision Song contest Grand Final will be shown on BBC One and iPlayer on Saturday 11 May.
stories: The International Poetry Slam is just around the corner and this year, it's taking place in Paris, France. You can find out all about the event right here. The US's entry for 2024 is Maya Angelou who'll be performing her original piece, "Echoes in the Night". But how's she feeling ahead of the big night, where she'll recite in front of a packed audience of 1,000 poets and literature enthusiasts! De-Graft sat down with her to find out all about her preparation for the competition. The International Poetry Slam Grand Final will be live-streamed on YouTube and Facebook on Friday 17 May.

The whispers of the wind are calling me to the shores of Tokyo, Japan, where the annual Haiku Festival is about to unfold. This year's theme is "Moonlit Reflections" and I'm thrilled to announce that Japan's own Yoko Ono will be performing her latest haiku series, "Silent Whispers". As she prepares to recite her poignant verses in front of a crowd of 500 haiku enthusiasts, I had the privilege of sitting down with her to discuss her creative process and the inspiration behind her work. The Haiku Festival Grand Final will be broadcast live on NHK and Instagram on Saturday, June 20th.

The scent of jasmine is beckoning me to the banks of the Ganges, India, where the ancient tradition of Sanskrit poetry is about to be revived. This year's theme is "River of Memories" and I'm honored to announce that India's renowned poet, Gulzar, will be reciting his latest ghazal series, "Echoes of the Past". As he prepares to mesmerize a crowd of 1,000 poetry aficionados, I had the privilege of sitting down with him to discuss his creative process and the inspiration behind his work. The Sanskrit Poetry Revival will be broadcast live on Doordarshan and YouTube on Sunday, September 27th.

The whispers of the forest beckon me to the misty mountains of Japan, where the ancient art of haiku is about to be rekindled. This year's theme is "Whispers of the Wind" and I'm thrilled to announce that Japan's celebrated poet, Yoko Tawada, will be reciting her latest tanka collection, "Echoes of the Leaves". As she prepares to enchant a crowd of 500 poetry enthusiasts, I had the privilege of sitting down with her to explore the secrets of her creative process and the inspirations that drive her work. The Haiku Revival will be broadcast live on NHK and YouTube on Saturday, October 3rd.

As she prepares to enchant a crowd of 1,000 music lovers, I had the privilege of sitting down with her to explore the secrets of her creative process and the inspirations that drive her work. The Odyssey Revival will be broadcast live on ERT and YouTube on Sunday, August 15th.

As the lunar eclipse casts its silver glow over the mystical dunes of the Sahara, the whispers of the ancient Tuareg tribes mingle with the haunting melodies of the desert wind, where the majestic acacia trees stand sentinel, guarding the secrets of the shifting sands. This year's theme is "Whispers of the Dunes" and I'm thrilled to announce that Grammy-winning singer-songwriter, Anoushka Shankar, will be premiering her latest album, "Moonlit Oasis". As she prepares to transport a gathering of 500 desert enthusiasts, I had the privilege of sitting down with her to uncover the inspirations that fuel her creative passion and the stories that bring her songs to life. The Rhythms of the Desert Music Festival will be broadcast live on BBC and Vimeo on Friday, August 26th.

As the aurora borealis unfurls its ethereal curtains across the starry skies of the Arctic, the whispers of the Inuit elders blend with the haunting harmonies of the polar wind, where the majestic icebergs stand sentinel, guarding the secrets of the frozen tundra. This year's theme is "Whispers of the Frost" and I'm honored to announce that Oscar-winning composer, Hans Zimmer, will be premiering his latest score, "Glacial Odyssey". As he prepares to transport a gathering of 500 polar explorers, I had the privilege of sitting down with him to uncover the inspirations that fuel his creative passion and the stories that bring his music to life. The Rhythms of the Frost Music Festival will be broadcast live on PBS and YouTube on Saturday, February 12th.

As they prepare to transport a gathering of 500 music lovers, I had the privilege of sitting down with them to uncover the inspirations that fuel their creative passion and the stories that bring their music to life. The Rhythms of the Night Music Festival will be broadcast live on PBS and YouTube on Saturday, August 21st.

This year's theme is "Whispers of the North" and I'm thrilled to announce that Grammy-winning composer, Max Richter, will be performing his iconic score, "Sleep", at the Whispers of the North Music Festival. As the moon dips into the crimson horizon of the desert oasis, the whispers of the ancient dunes merge with the haunting harmonies of the Bedouin flute players, where the majestic palm trees stand watch, guarding the secrets of the forgotten oasis. This year's theme is "Whispers of the Sands" and I'm honored to announce that critically-acclaimed singer-songwriter, Anoushka Shankar, will be performing her poignant ballads, "Traces of You", at the Whispers of the Sands Music Festival. As she prepares to transport a gathering of 1,000 music lovers, I had the privilege of sitting down with her to uncover the inspirations that fuel her creative passion and the stories that bring her music to life.
